content.body: annevk: for the fetch issue, can we count on client to always be task destination? `useParallelQueue` seems to change that, e.g. for sync XHR but I guess it's not in use much?

content.body: I guess it's OK in that case to use the parallel queue as the task destination anyway (thinking out loud)
